text: Police personnel bring Savinder Kumar, who was arrested with 50 pistols (in the photo at right) and 100 cartridges , to the police headquarters in New Delhi on Wednesday. The 33-year-old man, hailing from Meerut, revealed during interrogation that he had supplied more than 400 pistols to criminals in Delhi and the National Capital Region during the past18 months.— PHOTOS: Shiv Kumar Pushpakar
title: Major haul of illegal arms in New Delhi
